actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to Senate Committee the Judiciary.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to freedom of choice and compulsory transportation in connection with public schools.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the right of any citizen to be assigned, within designated school districts, to the public school of his parents' or guardians' choice if a minor, or to the school of his choice if an adult, should not be denied or abridged either directly or by means of a condition precedent to the receipt of Federal financial assistance; and that there should be no compulsory transportation of school children from one school district to another to achieve racial balance in public schools.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to freedom of choice and compulsory transportation in connection with public schools.
